name: HYPERLOOP
description:
Gameplay

Use mouse to surround enemies with your tail to score. The time spent is deducted from the points. When you hit a wall, the tail breaks. You lose health when you hit an enemy. Surround multiple enemies at once to get combo points. If the enemy hits the tail, it breaks.

Made for https://itch.io/jam/kattilajam-one with a theme: "Clear"

Team
  • NANIkisunami (Game Design, Art)
  • Antti Koponen (Technical Design, Programming, Sound Design, Animation)
  • Juha Smith https://open.spotify.com/artist/21r0elaqBgWIbUhXgfEsZY (Music, voice acting)
  • Special thanks to Markku "Maco" Hietamäki for some code help
Tools
  • Unity
  • Krita
  • Gimp
  • Arturia V Collection 7
  • Studio One.
Assets
  • Font: CGF Locust Resistance by CGF Chris Garrett Fonts
